revised_title: Aerosol Formation by Condensation of Dilute Vapour in a Carrier Gas
tldr: The authors study the formation of an aerosol by condensation of a dilute vapour in a carrier gas. They examine the process theoretically and show how the partial differential equations of this kind of problem can be reduced to a set of ordinary differential equations, which can be more easily handled numerically. An approximate solution is obtained, demonstrating how the average particle size depends on the rate of cooling and the time of quenching.
